00664 {

01382 // Output buffer macros
01383 
01384 
01385 #define V1724_HEADER_TAG_MSK                                                    0xA0000000                                                                                                      
01387 #define CVT_V1724_IS_HEADER_TAG(data_0)                                 ((data_0& 0xF0000000)== V1724_HEADER_TAG_MSK)                           
01389 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_TAG(data_0)                                 ((UINT32)((((UINT32)data_0)>>28)& 0x0000000f))                          
01390 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_SIZE(data_0)                                ((UINT32)(((UINT32)data_0)& 0x0fffffff))                                        
01392 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_ACTIVE_CHANNELS(data_1)             ((UINT32)(((UINT32)data_1)& 0x000000ff))                                        
01393 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_BOARD_ID(data_1)                    ((UINT32)((((UINT32)data_1)>>27)& 0x0000001f))                          
01395 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_COUNT(data_2)                               ((UINT32)(((UINT32)data_2)& 0x00ffffff))                                        
01397 #define CVT_V1724_GET_EVENT_TRIGGER_TIME_TAG(data_3)    ((UINT32)(((UINT32)data_3)& 0xffffffff))                                        
01400 #if defined (__GNUC__)
01401         #define         PACKED_1                __attribute__ ((packed, aligned(1)))
01402         #define         _INLINE_                __inline__ 
01403 #else
01404         #define         PACKED_1
01405         #define         _INLINE_                
01406 #endif
01407 #if defined(WIN32)|| defined(_WIN32_WCE)
01408         #pragma pack(push)
01409         #pragma pack(1)
01410 #endif
01411 
01412 
01413 #define CVT_V1724_MAX_BLT_EVENT_NUM             4               
01415 
01416 
01421 
01422 typedef union PACKED_1
01423 {
01424         struct                                                                          
01425         {
01426                 union
01427                 {
01428                         struct
01429                         {
01430                                 UINT32 m_event_size: 28 ;               /* Event size */                
01431                                 UINT32 m_header_tag: 4 ;                /* Header tag */                
01432                         } m_fields ;
01433                         UINT32 m_DWORD;
01434                 } m_HEADER_0;
01435                 union
01436                 {
01437                         struct
01438                         {
01439                                 UINT32 m_active_channel_msk: 8 ;        /* Active channels msk */               
01440                                 UINT32 m_reserved: 19 ;                         /* reserved */          
01441                                 UINT32 m_board_id: 5 ;                          /* Board Id */          
01442                         } m_fields ;
01443                         UINT32 m_DWORD;
01444                 } m_HEADER_1;
01445                 union
01446                 {
01447                         struct
01448                         {
01449                                 UINT32 m_event_counter: 24 ;            /* Event counter */             
01450                                 UINT32  : 8;                                            /* undefined */         
01451                         } m_fields ;
01452                         UINT32 m_DWORD;
01453                 } m_HEADER_2;
01454                 union
01455                 {
01456                         struct
01457                         {
01458                                 UINT32 m_trigger_time_tag: 32;          /* Timestamp */         
01459                         } m_fields ;
01460                         UINT32 m_DWORD;
01461                 } m_HEADER_3;
01462         } m_fields;
01463         UINT32 m_DWORD[ 4];
01464 } CVT_V1724_HEADER;
01465 
01466 #if defined(WIN32)|| defined(_WIN32_WCE)
01467         #pragma pack(pop)
01468 #endif
